#summary How to report issue / defect.

No one is perfect. To improve our project, we hope to receive all invaluable suggestions from you. Please give us the details of your problem so that we can fix it best. In the meantime, please bare with us and as soon as your issues are fixed, we shall notify you.

= Who =

Anyone interested in our benchmark. We extremely appreciate all comments and questions.


= How =

If you have a Gmail account. Go to the [https://code.google.com/p/benchmarkcrowd/issues/list Issues] menu and open a new issue.

Otherwise, please report the issue to [http://lamtran3101@gmail.com lamtran3101@gmail.com] with the following template and we will open the issue for you (without revealing your identity):

*Title:*

Enter one-line summary

*Description:*

What steps will reproduce the problem?

1.

2.

3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead? (A screenshot is
especially helpful for us)


What version of the product are you using? On what operating system?


Please provide any additional information below.


= Why = 

If you have other kinds of questions, please contact [http://thanhtamlhp@gmail.com thanhtamlhp@gmail.com]
